Art. 4.153. 
Calculation mass for determining the available portion 
The reduction is determined by forming a calculation mass of all the property existing at the death of the deceased. After deduction of debts, those disposed of by gift are fictitiously combined with it, according to their condition and value as defined in Art. 4.90, ¤¤ 2 to 9. From all these assets, the amount that he was able to dispose of is calculated, having regard to the status of the heirs he leaves.
